casebody.data: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Bruce C. HARRINGTON. No. D-2954. Supreme Court of the United States March 20, 2017. Bruce C. Harrington, of Topeka, Kansas, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of the law in this Court.
